POKE :3

Always sad when really nice mods stop progress...

Oh, well... POKE!

Every time you bump this thread, nothke delays it 1 day.

Wait, wait... damn it.
Damn, guess here goes another day....

dang but i might as well poke

poke

poke

poke

poke....

poke

I advise against further poking -forum rules against content-less bumps etc. As pretty as these parts are it is probably best to just try and forget the teasers posted here. There are now Cargo Transfer Bags with multiple skins that look pretty good and the default KAS boxes by zzz are still wonderful. If Nothke releases these then great, but until then I am done being excited by the out of reach prettiness and I recommend the this position to all of you. Nothke owes us nothing and pressure can make this stuff feel like work. 2 cents..
okay:sealed:

Screw it, I'll bump it anyways.

PPOOOKKKEE!!

Nothke, I don't care if you release it now or at the end of time, just as long as you don't forget it's existence.

I'm sure he hasn't forgotten about this mod.

There are now Cargo Transfer Bags with multiple skins that look pretty good and the default KAS boxes by zzz are still wonderful.

Just out of curiosity where can I find these cargo Transfer bags?

I'm sure he hasn't forgotten about this mod.

Just out of curiosity where can I find these cargo Transfer bags?

Here.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/70986-0-23-Cargo-Transfer-Bags%28for-TAC-life-support%29-0-5-1

Just out of curiosity where can I find these cargo Transfer bags?

Forum thread here

I am working on the mod. I am right now preoccupied with a particle overhaul system that I am making with Sarbian. The reason why you don't see updates is cause they are not cosmetic. Someone told me about the bags yesterday, and what can I say. That's the result of postponing the mod for such a long time. I am trying to find any free time in my life to work on it.

Edited March 1, 2014 by nothke
I'd rather you focus on one mod nothke, so you could finish at least one, slowly but surely!
blackheart612: Careful what you ask for, you might get it. (meaning, Nothke focusing on a mod that's not this one)
Doesn't matter. At least he'll be able to finish something than juggling all of them at once, imo... (I mean all his mods are amazing.)

With these bags, we can wait a while longer, this mod really does relieve me

Cargo Transfer Bags (for life support, KAS part container, storing science equipment.)

Well, I'd prefer to use your FLEXrack than those bags. What the hell, who's the guy that puts oxigen in a bag??

Keep up with your excellent work, nothke!

Well, I'd prefer to use your FLEXrack than those bags. What the hell, who's the guy that puts oxigen in a bag??

It's the kerbal way ^^ No, seriously, a mesh for small gas cylinders is about to be released

I'm not big on this mod^ because it requires another mod that I don't want {Modular fuel? Modular tanks? Something don't remember now.} unless I missed something, and that mod is independent. I'd much rather have a stand alone mod. I haven't seen anything about flexrack needing another mod.

Yeah,same here, and I didn't want to bother rewriting the cfgs to make them work without module fuels, as the bags aren't the part I'm excited for anyways. I've got HexCans hooked up with Kas, that does the same thing. I want the racks.
